name: Wanderings of a High School Boy
name_original: Wanderings of a High School Boy
description:
It was a pretty hard theme. We tried to spin the "You Start with Nothing" by taking away any context or objective from the player. We tried to keep the story subtle, but I dunno how well we did.

You follow a boy wandering around aimlessly, interact with characters, and try to uncover his story as you go along.

Thanks for checking this out!
